name: Managing behaviour to reduce energy use
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session looks at the task of understanding and then managing and changing behaviour to reduce energy use in buildings. Speakers will cover emerging thinking on the perception of comfort and how people behave in relation to temperature and air flow and how to tap into occupier preferences and behaviours.
